summary: Dedicated Customer Service Agent with excellent communication skills and a passion for helping customers. Experienced in handling customer inquiries, resolving issues, and providing exceptional service in fast-paced call center environments.

workExperience.title: Executive Officer Coordinator
workExperience.description: As an Executive Officer Coordinator, I supported executive operations, made sure internal coordination ran smoothly, and helped provide outstanding guest service. In addition to helping with VIP experiences, internal reporting, recruiting, and strategic planning, I oversaw scheduling, communications, and departmental follow-ups.
responsibilities: Supported executive operations and ensured smooth internal coordination across departments.
Delivered outstanding guest service, addressing customer concerns and managing VIP experiences.
Coordinated hotel activities both day and evening, overseeing a team to ensure seamless execution.
Managed internal communications to ensure alignment between teams and departments.
Handled internal reporting, recruitment, and strategic planning.
Collected and analyzed customer feedback to improve guest experience and followed up on their journey throughout their stay.
Oversaw scheduling, departmental follow-ups, and ensured timely completion of tasks.

workExperience.title: TV Operator Survey Agent
workExperience.description: Conducting telephone surveys to gather data on TV viewership and audience preferences.
responsibilities: Initiating Calls: Reach out to selected individuals to participate in surveys.
Administering Surveys: Pose predetermined questions, ensuring clarity and neutrality to avoid influencing responses.
Recording Responses: Accurately document participants' answers, often using computer systems or specialized software.
Maintaining Confidentiality: Handle all respondent information with strict confidentiality, adhering to data protection protocols.
Achieving Targets: Meet set goals for the number of completed surveys within specified time frames.

workExperience.title: Customer Service Agent
workExperience.description: Providing exceptional customer service and support through various communication channels.
responsibilities: Handling customer inquiries and resolving issues efficiently
Managing high call volumes while maintaining quality service
Processing customer orders and managing account information
Collaborating with team members to improve service delivery

education.institution: Richfield Graduate Institute of Technology (Pty) Ltd.
